mapper.select: select product_code, product_name, SUM(o.quantity) quantity from (select product_id, SUM(quantity) quantity from tbl_order_product where order_code in (select order_code from tbl_order where order_status = 5) group by product_id) o JOIN tbl_product p on o.product_id = p.product_id group by p.product_code, product_name order by quantity desc;

select product_code, product_name, SUM(o.quantity) quantity from (select product_id, SUM(quantity) quantity from tbl_order_product where order_code in (select order_code from tbl_order where order_status = 5 and YEAR(created_at) = #{year} and QUARTER(created_at) = #{quarter}) group by product_id) o JOIN tbl_product p on o.product_id = p.product_id group by p.product_code, product_name order by quantity desc;
